馬甸尼得罪極端球迷組織

25.05.2009 16:48

【商台互動體育組】老懷安慰？效力AC米蘭的世界傳奇鐵衛馬甸尼，決定在季尾掛靴，原於周日聯賽在聖西路向球迷作出最後告別，豈料遭托迪的罰球壞了好事，不止於此的是，懷疑與隊長結下多年仇口的極端球迷組織，更在看台高舉「反馬甸尼」橫額，導致謝幕頓變「鬧劇」！
41歲的前意大利國腳馬甸尼，爲AC上陣逾900場比賽，鐵定於季末引退，於日前的主場謝幕戰完場前被托迪射入罰球，球隊以2:3負於羅馬，未能寫下完美結局，幸而大部份聖西路的粉絲亦有向隊長送上最熱烈的掌聲和歡呼；只不過，位於南看台的極端球迷組織(Ultra)卻揮舞帶有侮辱性字句的橫額，使米蘭市的美麗一夜出現了點點瑕疵。
比賽進行途中，部份南看台觀眾已舉起橫額：「謝謝隊長，場上你是一個永恆的榜樣，但卻對曾經幫你的人缺乏尊重。」比賽結束後，馬甸尼繞場答謝多年來的支持者，卻同時有狂迷舉起龐大的海報：「在25年的職業生涯中，你最應該感謝那些被你駡爲僱傭兵和乞丐的人。」
其後，那些球迷更把一件巨型的AC米蘭6號球衣，印上前隊長巴里斯的名字，並高呼：「我們只有一個隊長！」換言之，他們不把馬甸尼放在眼內。
據知，那批球會所屬的極端球迷組織之所以貿然「踩場」，是因馬甸尼在任紅黑軍團首領期間，一直反對他們的所作所為，05年雙方亦曾發生激烈的衝突，因此作出報復性行為。
面對尷尬場面，馬甸尼依然顯得非常鎖定，但離場時卻沒有接受記者提問，只在稍後時間表示：「我很自豪沒有成爲他們(極端組織)的一員。」反而教練安察洛堤就大動肝火：「那一小撮人的反對是不會破壞到這場的告別戰，馬甸尼是我們偉大球員，反對聲改變不了甚麼。」

Scaroni: Another big name, if...
Milan President Paolo Scaroni has confirmed that the club will try to sign another ‘big name’ this summer if Financial Fair Play allows it.

Elliott Management financed the signings of Lucas Paqueta and Krzysztof Piatek last month, both of whom have made instant impacts for Milan, and Scaroni is hoping to complement the pair with a third major purchase.

“We have a CEO of great international calibre in Ivan Gazidis who, in England, led Arsenal and, in the US, was the deputy commissioner of Major League Soccer,” he told Il Sole 24.

“We’ve divided the tasks between us. He manages the club and squad, I’m focused on the more Italian activities: football really is one of the biggest industries in our country and one of the beating hearts of our society.

“Here there are two mountains to climb, one of sporting results and the other of financial results.

“When I meet a fan full of enthusiasm who tells me ‘President, why don’t you buy another big name?’, I reply, ‘of course, if FFP allows it.’

“I also explain to them the mechanism that lets you buy players, only with resources that stem from club profits.

“They’re often struck when I tell them because they don’t know that rule. Football is changing a lot and everyone in it must adapt.”

replies.msg:
Revealed: AC Milan's secret weapon for Lozano signing; but Napoli...
Hirving Lozano is undoubtedly a top young star. The 23-year-old currently plays for Dutch side PSV Eindhoven but has been a target of top clubs since his impressive performances at the 2018 World Cup in Russia; most notably in Mexico's victory over Germany in their opening game.

Lozano was linked with moves to Barcelona, Real Madrid, Manchester United and Arsenal in the summer; as well as Juventus and Napoli. Napoli still remain in the chase for Lozano but the attention has seemingly switched to AC Milan, Inter Milan and AS Roma as their main competitors.

Milan hold an advantage in the sense of the good relationship between Leonardo and Lozano's agent, Mino Raiola. Despite this, however, Aurelio De Laurentiis seems intent on brining Lozano to Napoli for head coach Carlo Ancelotti.
